Magic
Spell Slots: S0: 6; S1: 4; S2: 3; S3: 3; S4: 3; S5: 2 Attack: S: 5 Spell DC: S: 13
Spells:
Acid Splash (S0 Conj): R60' Ranged touch inflicts 2d6 HP acid (Dexterity neg)
Clairvoyance (S3 Divi): R1 mile Self sees or hears remotely through invisible sensor for conc or 10 min
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self directs target's attacks (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 min
Dancing Lights (S0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights move 60' for conc or 1 min
Dimension Door (S4 Conj): Self and 1 other willing creature teleport up to 500'
Enlarge/Reduce (S2 Tran): R30' Target becomes dbl (Adv on Strength, +1d4 weapon damage) or half (Disadv on Strength, -1d4 weapon damage) size for conc or 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (S1 Tran): Self gains bonus Dash for conc or 10 min
Feather Fall (S1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60'/rd for 1 min
Fog Cloud (S1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc or 1 hr [+Level increases radius +20']
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/target for conc or 1 min
Ice Storm (S4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Light (S0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Lightning Bolt (S3 Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Ray Of Frost (S0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Ray Of Sickness (S1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution not poisoned) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes appearance of targets (Charisma neg) for 8 hr
Shatter (S2 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Stoneskin (S4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Telekinesis (S5 Tran): R60' Moves 1000 lb 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc or 10 min
Tongues (S3 Divi): Touched understands and speaks any language for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Bend Luck: May spend 2 Sorcery Points to add or subtract 1d4 from a target attack, ability, or save
Font Of Magic: May use 10 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Heightened Spell: May spend 3 Sorcery Points to inflict target Disadv on spell save
Subtle Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell w/out somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: May spend spell level Sorcery Points to add a second spell target
War Caster: Adv on concentration to maintain a spell/May cast when holding a shield and/or weapon/May use Reaction to cast as an OA
Wild Magic Surge: Spellcasting carries a 5% chance of unleashing a random magic effect
